org.jsapar.compose

Class AbstractSchemaComposer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jsapar.compose.AbstractSchemaComposer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SchemaComposer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CsvComposer, FixedWidthComposer

    public abstract class AbstractSchemaComposer
extends Object
implements SchemaComposer
    Abstract base class for schema composers with standard behavior. This implementation will only consider the line type when choosing which schema line type to use.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

        public boolean composeLine(Line line)

        Parameters:
